item.title: The New Dot Com Bubble is Here: It’s Called Online Advertising [The Correspondent]
item.description: The New Dot Com Bubble is Here: It’s Called Online Advertising. Jesse Frederick; Maurits Martijn. https://thecorrespondent.com/100/the-new-dot-com-bubble-is-here-its-called-online-advertising/13228924500-22d5fd24 . Nov 6, 2019. In 2018, $273b was spent on digital ads. But are ad platforms any good at manipulating us? Tadelis, Econ Prof at UCB stint @ eBay: Consultants: paying for sponsored links for people that searched for ‘eBay’ was a $245.6m return, not a $20m expense. Selection Effect: What if the ad clickers were going to use eBay anyway?
